001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.Date;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
011import java.util.function.BiFunction;
012import java.util.function.BiPredicate;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014
015import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
016import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass;
017import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EGenericType;
018import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.ENamedElement;
019import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
020import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage;
021import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage.Registry;
022import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EReference;
023import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature;
024import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet;
025import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
026import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
027import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
028import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
029import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
030import org.nasdanika.ncore.util.NcoreUtil;
031import org.nasdanika.persistence.ConfigurationException;
032import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
033import org.nasdanika.persistence.ObjectFactory;
034import org.nasdanika.persistence.ObjectLoader;
035import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
036
037import io.github.azagniotov.matcher.AntPathMatcher;
038import io.github.azagniotov.matcher.AntPathMatcher.Builder;
039
040/**
041 * Creates reference value/element - {@link EObject} or proxy.
042 * May create zero or more elements for filesets and resourcesets.
043 * @author Pavel
044 *
045 */
046public class ReferenceFactory implements ObjectFactory<List<?>> {
047        
048        private static final String FILESET_EXCLUDE_KEY = "exclude";
049        private static final String FILESET_INCLUDE_KEY = "include";
050        private static final String FILESET_BASE_KEY = "base";
051        public static final String FILESET_SCHEME = "fileset:";
052        public static final String FACTORY_SCHEME = "factory:";
053        
054        private EObjectLoader resolver;
055        private BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement, String> keyProvider;
056        private boolean isStrictContainment;
057        private boolean referenceSupplierFactory;
058        private boolean resolveProxies;
059        private boolean isHomogenous;
060        private EReference eReference;
061        private EClass eClass;
062        private Object eReferenceKey;
063        
064        public EReference getEReference() {
065                return eReference;
066        }
067        
068        public boolean isHomogenous() {
069                return isHomogenous;
070        }
071
072        /**
073         * 
074         * @param eClass
075         * @param eReference
076         * @param eReferenceKey Reference key for loading type from annotations. If null, defautls to eReference name. Used by EMap's.
077         * @param resolver
078         * @param referenceSupplierFactory
079         * @param keyProvider
080         */
081        public ReferenceFactory(
082                        EClass eClass,
083                        EReference eReference,
084                        String eReferenceKey,  
085                        EObjectLoader resolver,
086                        boolean referenceSupplierFactory,
087                        BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider) {
088                
089                this.eClass = eClass;
090                this.eReference = eReference;
091                this.eReferenceKey = Util.isBlank(eReferenceKey) ? eReference.getName() : eReferenceKey;
092                this.resolver = resolver;
093                this.referenceSupplierFactory = referenceSupplierFactory;
094                this.resolveProxies = !eReference.isResolveProxies();
095                this.keyProvider = keyProvider;
096                
097                this.isHomogenous = "true".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, EObjectLoader.IS_HOMOGENOUS)) || NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, EObjectLoader.REFERENCE_TYPE) != null;                 
098                this.isStrictContainment = isHomogenous && "true".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, EObjectLoader.IS_STRICT_CONTAINMENT));                      
099        }
100        
101        @Override
102        public List<?> create(ObjectLoader loader, Object element, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
103                try {
104                        // Strings are references if not strict containment.
105                        if (element instanceof String && !isStrictContainment) {
106                                if (referenceSupplierFactory) {
107                                        return Collections.singletonList(new SupplierFactory<List<EObject>>() {  
108        
109                                                @Override
110                                                public Supplier<List<EObject>> create(Context context) {
111                                                        String ref = context.interpolateToString((String) element);
112                                                        return new Supplier<List<EObject>>() {
113        
114                                                                @Override
115                                                                public double size() {
116                                                                        return 1;
117                                                                }
118        
119                                                                @Override
120                                                                public String name() {
121                                                                        return "Loading " + ref;
122                                                                }
123        
124                                                                @Override
125                                                                public List<EObject> execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
126                                                                        return loadReference(ref, base, markers, progressMonitor);
127                                                                }
128                                                                
129                                                        };
130                                                }
131                                                
132                                        });
133                                }
134                                return loadReference((String) element, base, markers, progressMonitor);
135                        }
136                        Object ret = isHomogenous ? resolver.create(loader, effectiveReferenceType(element), element, base, progressMonitor, markers, keyProvider, null) : loader.load(element, base, progressMonitor);
137                        if (resolveProxies && ret instanceof EObject && ((EObject) ret).eIsProxy()) {
138                                return Collections.singletonList(resolver.resolve((EObject) ret));
139                        }
140                        return Collections.singletonList(ret);
141                } catch (ConfigurationException e) {
142                        throw e;
143                } catch (Exception e) {
144                        if (markers == null || markers.isEmpty()) {
145                                throw e;
146                        }
147                        throw new ConfigurationException("Error loading reference: " + e, e, markers);
148                }
149        }
150                
151        /**
152         * Loads reference. Creates a proxy if reference type is not abstract and resolve proxies is true.
153         * @param ref
154         * @param base
155         * @param marker
156         * @return
157         */
158        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
159        protected List<EObject> loadReference(
160                        String ref, 
161                        URI base,
162                        List<? extends Marker> markers, 
163                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
164                
165                if (ref.startsWith(FILESET_SCHEME)) {
166                        // Includes, excludes, factory, prototype
167                        String spec = ref.substring(FILESET_SCHEME.length());
168                        Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
169                        Object filesetSpec = yaml.load(spec);                   
170                        if (filesetSpec instanceof String) {                            
171                                return loadMatches(base, Collections.singleton((String) filesetSpec), null, base, markers, progressMonitor);
172                        } 
173                        
174                        if (filesetSpec instanceof List) {
175                                return loadMatches(base, (List<String>) filesetSpec, null, base, markers, progressMonitor);                             
176                        }
177                        
178                        if (filesetSpec instanceof Map) {
179                                Map<String,Object> specMap = (Map<String,Object>) filesetSpec;
180                                org.nasdanika.persistence.Util.checkUnsupportedKeys(specMap, FILESET_BASE_KEY, FILESET_INCLUDE_KEY, FILESET_EXCLUDE_KEY);
181                                Object fsBase = specMap.get(FILESET_BASE_KEY);
182                                if (fsBase == null || fsBase instanceof String) {
183                                        URI fsBaseURI = fsBase == null ? base : URI.createFileURI((String) fsBase).resolve(base);
184                                        java.util.function.Function<Object, Collection<String>> asCollection = obj -> {
185                                                if (obj == null) {
186                                                        return null;
187                                                }
188                                                if (obj instanceof String) {
189                                                        return Collections.singletonList((String) obj);
190                                                }
191                                                if (obj instanceof Collection) {
192                                                        return (Collection<String>) obj;
193                                                }
194                                                throw new ConfigurationException("Expected a string or an array of strings, got " + obj.getClass() + ": " + obj, markers);
195                                        };
196                                        return loadMatches(fsBaseURI, asCollection.apply(specMap.get(FILESET_INCLUDE_KEY)), asCollection.apply(specMap.get(FILESET_EXCLUDE_KEY)), base, markers, progressMonitor);                              
197                                } else if (fsBase != null) {
198                                        throw new ConfigurationException("FileSet base shall be a string: " + fsBase.getClass() + ": " + fsBase, markers);                      
199                                }
200                        }
201                        
202                        throw new ConfigurationException("Unsupported FileSet specification type: " + filesetSpec.getClass() + ": " + filesetSpec, markers);                    
203                }
204                
205                if (ref.startsWith(FACTORY_SCHEME)) {
206                        // Factory
207                
208                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Factories are not supported yet");
209                }               
210                
211                // Single value
212                URI refURI = URI.createURI(ref);
213                if (base != null && !ref.startsWith(EObjectLoader.LATE_PROXY_RESOLUTION_URI_PREFIX)) {
214                        refURI = refURI.resolve(base);
215                }
216                ConfigurationException.pushThreadMarker(markers);
217                try {
218                        EClass eReferenceType = effectiveReferenceType(ref);
219                        if (!eReferenceType.isAbstract() && !resolveProxies) {
220                                // Can create proxy, if possible, instead of loading object
221                                EObject proxy = resolver.createProxy(eReferenceType, Collections.singletonMap(EObjectLoader.HREF_KEY, refURI), base, markers, progressMonitor);
222                                if (proxy != null) {
223                                        if (markers != null && !markers.isEmpty()) {
224                                                proxy.eAdapters().add(new MarkedAdapter(markers));
225                                        }
226                                        return Collections.singletonList(proxy);
227                                }
228                        }
229                        return Collections.singletonList(resolver.getResourceSet().getEObject(refURI, true));
230                } finally {
231                        ConfigurationException.popThreadMarker();
232                }       
233        }
234
235        private List<EObject> loadMatches(
236                        URI fileSetBase,
237                        Collection<String> includes, 
238                        Collection<String> excludes, 
239                        URI base,
240                        List<? extends Marker> markers,
241                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
242                if (!fileSetBase.isFile()) {
243                        throw new ConfigurationException("Base URI for a fileset is not a file URI: " + fileSetBase, markers);
244                }
245                String baseFileStr = fileSetBase.toFileString();                                
246                File baseDir = new File(baseFileStr);
247                if (baseDir.isFile()) {
248                        baseDir = baseDir.getParentFile();
249                }
250                return match(baseDir, includes, excludes).stream().map(f -> loadReference(f.toURI().toString(), base, markers, progressMonitor)).flatMap(objs -> objs.stream()).collect(Collectors.toList());           
251        }
252        
253        private static Collection<File> match(File baseDir, Collection<String> includes, Collection<String> excludes) {
254                Builder builder = new AntPathMatcher.Builder();
255                AntPathMatcher matcher = builder.build();
256                Map<String,File> collector = new HashMap<>();
257                if (includes == null || includes.isEmpty()) {
258                        include(baseDir, (file,path) -> true, collector);
259                } else {
260                        for (String include: includes) {
261                                include(baseDir, (file,path) -> matcher.isMatch(peel(include), path), collector);
262                        }
263                }
264                if (excludes != null) {
265                        collector.keySet().removeIf(path -> excludes.stream().filter(exclude -> matcher.isMatch(peel(exclude), path)).findAny().isPresent());
266                }                               
267                return collector.values();
268        }
269        
270        /**
271         * Removes leading ./ if it is present
272         * @param baseDir
273         * @param pattern
274         * @return
275         */
276        private static String peel(String pattern) {
277                return pattern != null && pattern.startsWith("./") ? peel(pattern.substring(2)) : pattern;
278        }
279        
280        private static void include(File baseDir, BiPredicate<File,String> predicate, Map<String, File> collector) {
281                BiConsumer<File, String> listener = new BiConsumer<File, String>() {
282                        
283                        @Override
284                        public void accept(File file, String path) {
285                                if (predicate.test(file, path)) {
286                                        collector.put(path, file);
287                                }                                               
288                        }
289                };
290                org.nasdanika.common.Util.walk(null, listener, baseDir.listFiles());            
291        }       
292        
293        protected String referenceTypeName(Object element) {
294                if (element instanceof String) {
295                        return "string";
296                }
297                if (element instanceof Integer) {
298                        return "integer";
299                }
300                if (element instanceof Map) {
301                        return "map";
302                }
303                if (element instanceof Collection) {
304                        return "list";
305                }
306                if (element instanceof Boolean) {
307                        return "boolean";
308                }
309                if (element instanceof Date) {
310                        return "date";
311                }
312                // More types?
313                return null;
314        }
315                
316        /**
317         * @return Effective reference type which defaults to the reference type, but can be overridden by the <code>reference-types</code> annotation. 
318         */
319        public EClass effectiveReferenceType(Object element) {
320                EGenericType eGenericReferenceType = eClass.getFeatureType(eReference);
321                EClass eReferenceType = (EClass) eGenericReferenceType.getEClassifier();
322                
323                String rTypes = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, EObjectLoader.REFERENCE_TYPE);
324                if (!Util.isBlank(rTypes)) {
325                        Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
326                        Map<String,Object> rTypesMap = yaml.load(rTypes);
327                        String valueFeature = EObjectLoader.getValueFeature(eReference);
328                        Object refType;
329                        if (!Util.isBlank(valueFeature) && element instanceof Map) {
330                                refType = rTypesMap.get(referenceTypeName(((Map<?,?>) element).get(valueFeature)));
331                        } else {
332                                refType = rTypesMap.get(referenceTypeName(element));                            
333                        }
334                        if (refType != null) {
335                                return resolveEClass(refType, eReference.getEContainingClass().getEPackage());
336                        }                               
337                }
338                
339                for (EClass ec: NcoreUtil.lineage(eClass)) {
340                        String refTypes = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ec, EObjectLoader.REFERENCE_TYPES);
341                        if (!Util.isBlank(refTypes)) {
342                                Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
343                                Map<String,Object> refTypesMap = yaml.load(refTypes);
344                                Object refType = refTypesMap.get(eReferenceKey);
345                                if (refType != null) {
346                                        return resolveEClass(refType, ec.getEPackage());
347                                }                               
348                        }
349                }
350                return eReferenceType;
351        }       
352        
353        public EStructuralFeature effectiveDefaultFeature(Object element) { 
354                EClass effectiveReferenceType = effectiveReferenceType(element);
355                for (EStructuralFeature feature: effectiveReferenceType.getEAllStructuralFeatures()) {
356                        if (EObjectLoader.isDefaultFeature(effectiveReferenceType, feature)) {
357                                return feature;
358                        }
359                }
360                return null;
361        }
362        
363        protected EClass resolveEClass(Object typeSpec, EPackage ePackage) {
364                String typeName;
365                if (typeSpec instanceof String) {
366                        typeName = (String) typeSpec;
367                } else if (typeSpec instanceof Map) {
368                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
369                        Map<String, Object> refTypeMap = (Map<String,Object>) typeSpec;
370                        Object nsURI = refTypeMap.get("ns-uri");
371                        if (nsURI instanceof String) {
372                                ResourceSet resourceSet = resolver.getResourceSet();
373                                Registry packageRegistry = resourceSet.getPackageRegistry();
374                                ePackage = packageRegistry.getEPackage((String) nsURI); 
375                                if (ePackage == null) {
376                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("EPackage not found: " + nsURI);                                                                                                     
377                                }
378                                Object className = refTypeMap.get("name");
379                                if (className instanceof String) {
380                                        typeName = (String) className;
381                                } else {
382                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Reference type specification name shall be a String, got: " + className);                                                                                                   
383                                }
384                        } else {
385                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Reference type specification ns-uri shall be a String, got: " + nsURI);                                             
386                        }                                       
387                } else {
388                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported reference type specification: " + typeSpec.getClass() + ": " + typeSpec);
389                }                                       
390                
391                EClass ret = (EClass) ePackage.getEClassifier(typeName);
392                if (ret == null) {
393                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Reference type " + typeName + " not found in EPackage " + ePackage.getNsURI());                                             
394                }
395                return ret;
396        }
397        
398}
